created_by: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)
name: Office Autorun Keys Modification
description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
false_positives: Legitimate software automatically (mostly, during installation) sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
Legitimate administrator sets up autorun keys for legitimate reason
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:/[Ss][Ee][Tt][Vv][Aa][Ll][Uu][Ee]/ AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Ww][Oo][Ww]6432[Nn][Oo][Dd][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/) AND registry.path:(/.*\\[Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Oo][Ii][Nn][Tt]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Nn][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*\\[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt]\\[Ss][Pp][Ee][Cc][Ii][Aa][Ll]\\[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ff].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:/\([Ee][Mm][Pp][Tt][Yy]\)/) OR (registry.path:(/.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Cc][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ll][Ii][Bb]\.[Aa][Dd][Hh][Oo][Cc][Rr][Ee][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Pp][Ll][Uu][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Mm][Aa][Pp][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ii][Mm]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ss][Hh][Ii][Mm]\.[Ii][Nn][Qq][Uu][Ii][Rr][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Pp][Ii][Vv][Oo][Tt][Ee][Xx][Cc][Ee][Ll][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Ee][Nn][Tt][Rr][Yy]\.1\\.*/)) OR (registry.path:(/.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Dd][Cc]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Aa][Gg][Uu][Ee][Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Ll][Ll][Ee][Aa][Gg][Uu][Ee][Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Cc]\.[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Aa][Cc][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Oo][Rr]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Oo][Ll][Rr][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Vv][Bb][Aa][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.1\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Cc][Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\.[Oo][Cc][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Ss]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Ss][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Gg][Ee][Nn][Oo][Tt][Ii][Ff][Ii][Ee][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Ll][Yy][Nn][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Uu][Cc][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.1.*/ OR /.*\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Uu][Mm][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\.[Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Rr][Ee][Gg][Ii][Oo][Nn][Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn]\\.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Oo][Nn]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\\[Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss]\\.*/) AND process.executable:/.*\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Cc][Kk][Tt][Oo][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Vv][Gg]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND registry.path:/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Oo][Ff][Ff][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Oo][Uu][Tt][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk]\\[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\[Aa][Nn][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss]\.[Aa][Ss][Oo][Uu][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.EventType:SetValue AND registry.path:(*\\Software\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Office* OR *\\Software\\Microsoft\\Office*) AND registry.path:(*\\Word\\Addins* OR *\\PowerPoint\\Addins* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins* OR *\\Onenote\\Addins* OR *\\Excel\\Addins* OR *\\Access\\Addins* OR *test\\Special\\Perf*)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.Details:\(Empty\)) OR (registry.path:(*\\Excel\\Addins\\AdHocReportingExcelClientLib.AdHocReportingExcelClientAddIn.1\\* OR *\\Excel\\Addins\\ExcelPlugInShell.PowerMapConnect\\* OR *\\Excel\\Addins\\NativeShim\\* OR *\\Excel\\Addins\\NativeShim.InquireConnector.1\\* OR *\\Excel\\Addins\\PowerPivotExcelClientAddIn.NativeEntry.1\\*)) OR (registry.path:(*\\Outlook\\AddIns\\AccessAddin.DC\\* OR *\\Outlook\\AddIns\\ColleagueImport.ColleagueImportAddin\\* OR *\\Outlook\\AddIns\\EvernoteCC.EvernoteContactConnector\\* OR *\\Outlook\\AddIns\\EvernoteOLRD.Connect\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\Microsoft.VbaAddinForOutlook.1\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\OcOffice.OcForms\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\OscAddin.Connect\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\OutlookChangeNotifier.Connect\\* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\UCAddin.LyncAddin.1* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\UCAddin.UCAddin.1* OR *\\Outlook\\Addins\\UmOutlookAddin.FormRegionAddin\\*)) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\ClickToRun\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\Common\ Files\\Microsoft\ Shared\\ClickToRun\\Updates\\*) AND process.executable:*\\OfficeClickToRun.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\\AVG\\Antivirus\\RegSvr.exe AND registry.path:*\\Microsoft\\Office\\Outlook\\Addins\\Antivirus.AsOutExt\\*))))`
